title: Bug 102623: Image not refreshing after re-importing
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image does not refresh and the original image remains displayed.
OB: After importing a new image named "image1.jpg" into the layout again, the new image should be displayed, but the original image remains displayed.
EB: When importing a new image named "image1.jpg" into the layout again, the original image should be replaced with the new image, and the new image should be displayed instead.
SR:
1. Import a new image named "image1.jpg" into the layout. 
2. Verify that the original image is replaced with the new image and the new image is displayed.
